description: Authorities open a new criminal case against the religious group, banned in Russia since 2017.
title: Russian police raid Jehovah's Witnesses' homes
title_page: Russian police raid Jehovah's Witnesses' homes - BBC News
maintext: He said: "It's hard to deny that these cultists will remain and continue their activity... but at least they'll stop openly claiming to be a Christian faith, in other words, in the market place of existing Christian confessions this product will no longer be on display.
